name: Mirage Masks
description:
This game was made for TRIJAM #142 (True or False) and UNTITLED GAME JAM #57 (Masks).

To beat the Masks of Mirages, hit the fake one before time runs out. This is a simple game that can be played on computer or mobile.

CONTROLS

DESKTOP: Arrow Keys or Mouse.

MOBILE: Swipe in the screen.

Game by Róger Goulart (Instagram: @rodjer_goulart)
